description:
A man witnesses his own funeral.  A road is haunted by the spirits of the dead.  An overconfident climber takes a terrible fall.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jibun no Soushiki o Mita Otoko / Yuurei Kaidou / Kissaku Otoshi
The Man Who Saw His Own Funeral / Ghost Road / Kissaku`s Fall
自分の葬式を見た男 / 幽霊街道 / 吉作落とし
